transcript.title: Remote and Rural Health Care System Blog
transcript.content: The Prime Minister's next blog will focus on the remote and rural health care system. It will start 9am Wednesday 26 August and close 5pm Wednesday 2 September. He's keen to get your feedback - especially if you live in rural and remote areas - on how we can reform the health system to ensure it serves all Australians equally, so register to join the blog at www.pm.gov.au
